  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140168</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140168</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Konstrukcijska naloga</string>
            <string language="en">Constrution assignment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Constrution Anweisung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affectation de Constrution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atribuição de Constrution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assegnazione di Constrution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάθεση Constrution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asignación de Constrution</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pripravite simulacijo, ki prikazuje nihanje telesa obešenega na dve ali več vzporednih vzmeti.</string>
            <string language="en">Construct a simulation that shows oscillation of object attached to two or more parallel springs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstruieren Sie eine Simulation, die die 
Pendelbewegung der Nachricht angebracht bis zwei oder parallelere 
Frühlinge zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construisez une simulation qui montre 
l'oscillation de l'objet attachée des ressorts deux ou plus 
parallèles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construa uma simulação que mostre a oscilação 
do objeto unida umas molas a dois ou mais paralelos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruisca una simulazione che mostra 
l'oscillazione di oggetto fissata le molle a due o più paralleli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευάστε μια προσομοίωση που εμφανίζει ταλάντωση 
του αντικειμένου που συνδέεται με δύο ή περισσότερα παράλληλα 
ελατήρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Construya una simulación que muestre la 
oscilación del objeto asociada resortes dos o más paralelos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento armónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
